# <a name="insert-pictures-in-an-email-message-or-calendar-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="7dba8-102">在電子郵件訊息或行事曆事件中插入圖片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7dba8-102">Insert pictures in an email message or calendar event</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7dba8-103">您可以在 Outlook.com 電子郵件、行事曆事件或電子郵件簽章中，插入您電腦上的相片、gif 或剪貼畫，或 OneDrive 作為內嵌圖像。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7dba8-103">You can insert photos, gifs, or clipart from your computer or OneDrive as inline images in your Outlook.com email messages, calendar events, or email signature.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="7dba8-104">開始撰寫郵件或建立行事曆事件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7dba8-104">Begin composing a message or creating a calendar event.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="7dba8-105">選取 [**插入圖片] 內嵌**圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7dba8-105">Select the **Insert pictures inline** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="7dba8-106">在撰寫視窗的底部（**附加**圖示旁邊）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7dba8-106">at the bottom of the compose window (next to the **Attach** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="7dba8-107">).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7dba8-107">).</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="7dba8-108">選擇您要插入的圖片，然後選取 [**開啟**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7dba8-108">Choose the picture you want to insert and select **Open**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="7dba8-109">拖曳邊，以調整圖像大小。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7dba8-109">Drag the corners to resize the image.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="7dba8-110">以滑鼠右鍵按一下圖像以查看格式化選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7dba8-110">Right-click the image to see formatting options.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7dba8-111">閱讀如何[在 Outlook.com 中附加檔案的](https://support.office.com/article/8d7c1ea7-4e5f-44ce-bb6e-c5fcc92ba9ab?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)詳細資訊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7dba8-111">Read more about how to [attach files in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8d7c1ea7-4e5f-44ce-bb6e-c5fcc92ba9ab?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
